excerpt: Yo! Noticed your site’s lagging or just curious about who’s dropping by? SiteBay hooks you up with all the essentials for monitoring and logging your site’s traffic. Think of it as setting up a surveillance system for your online spot.
title: WordPress Logging and Monitoring
